15. Geoffry immediately succeeded in the Abbacy. He grant- ed a charter on March 19, 1328,2 and he was Abbot for some time after the period at which the present volume of the writs of the Abbey closes,

The King, its founder, was the great benefactor of the Abbey. But it is astonishing with what rapidity estates in land, churches and tithes were heaped upon the new foundation, by the magnates and barons of Angus and the North. It is not uninteresting to note the acquisitions of a single reign.
